name: Holes
description:
My first published 2D game!

(Barebone game right now, took 3 days for this part, more coming soon! Or should I move on?)

You play as a western miner mining for gold using your pick, you must max out all your upgrades and find the secret levels

WEBSITE: http://manualdeveloper.com/

HOW TO PLAY:

Pick up your pick using E and dig holes by pressing f while standing on top of chests. You will get a random amount of gold between 100 and 200 but can be upgraded later. The chest respawn time is 180 seconds and can be upgraded too. Also, press Q to drop Pick.

VERISON 1.0

Future Add-ons:

  • Vendor
    • Buy Faster Respawn Time
    • Buy Player Speed
    • Buy NPC to dig for you
  • Secret Levels
